HP Integrated Lights-Out Management, Version 2.
Comes with every ProLiant DL3x0 G5.
[http://h18013.www1.hp.com/products/servers/management/remotemgmt.html HP Proliant remote management]
[http://h18013.www1.hp.com/products/servers/management/iloadv2/index.html HP ILO2 Advanced]
Firmware: [http://h18023.www1.hp.com/support/files/lights-out/us/locate/1117_6220.html Downloads for RHEL4/amd64]
Also check the [http://amd.co.at/adminwiki/Hardware/Remote_Management AdminWiki on Remote Management]. [[Category:Origin-SICEKIT]]
